casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Jerome Cannon McCOY. No. 620P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. Charlesena E. Walker, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Jerome Cannon McCoy. Karen E. Long, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Stuart Albright, District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Attorney General on the 4th day of November 2005 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th day of January 2006."

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 4th day of November 2005 by Attorney General in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th day of January 2006."
